taskGroup.name: Create a UML model
taskGroup.intro:
This cheat sheet will guide you through the individual steps to create a model using the Unified Modeling Language (UML).
To assist you along the way, wizards and commands will be available for you to launch automatically.
taskGroup.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just created a UML model.
